name: Desaisiv Inc.
description: Provider of artificial intelligence (AI) and health-tech services intended to provide data-driven decisions for healthcare and insurance companies. The company's platform comprises an integration interface, a cloud-based data platform, AI analytics algorithms, and professional services expertise, enabling clients to have high-quality service, optimize resources, and increase their growth.
